00020 /*****************************************************************************

00022   sc_mutex.h -- The sc_mutex primitive channel class.
00023 
00024   Original Author: Martin Janssen, Synopsys, Inc., 2001-05-21

00029 #ifndef SC_MUTEX_H
00030 #define SC_MUTEX_H
00031 
00032 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_event.h"
00033 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_object.h"
00034 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_wait.h"
00035 #include "sysc/communication/sc_mutex_if.h"
00036 
00037 namespace sc_core {
00038 
00039 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 //  CLASS : sc_mutex
00041 //
00042 //  The sc_mutex primitive channel class.
00043 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 
00045 class SC_API sc_mutex
00046 : public sc_mutex_if,
00047   public sc_object
00048 {
00049 public:
00050 
00051     // constructors and destructor
00052 
00053     sc_mutex();
00054     explicit sc_mutex( const char* name_ );
00055         virtual ~sc_mutex();
00056 
00057 
00058     // interface methods
00059 
00060     // blocks until mutex could be locked
00061     virtual int lock();
00062 
00063     // returns -1 if mutex could not be locked
00064     virtual int trylock();
00065 
00066     // returns -1 if mutex was not locked by caller
00067     virtual int unlock();
00068 
00069     virtual const char* kind() const
00070         { return "sc_mutex"; }
00071 
00072 protected:
00073 
00074     // support methods
00075 
00076     bool in_use() const
00077         { return ( m_owner != 0 ); }
00078 
00079 protected:
00080 
00081     sc_process_b* m_owner;
00082     sc_event      m_free;
00083 
00084 private:
00085 
00086     // disabled
00087     sc_mutex( const sc_mutex& );
00088     sc_mutex& operator = ( const sc_mutex& );
00089 };
00090 
00091 } // namespace sc_core
00092
